h1_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish
content: The Keeper of the Flaming Mountains is a Character boss, while the Yin-Yang Fish is a Yaoguai King you'll fight at the start of The Emerald Hall in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The Keeper of the Flaming Mountains is a master of deception and uses his Yin-Yang ability to produce more than just the Yin-Yang Fish in this showdown.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeper_of_the_Flaming_Mountains_and_Yin-Yang_Fish.md', within the main section titled 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish'.
The content is as follows:
The Keeper of the Flaming Mountains is a Character boss, while the Yin-Yang Fish is a Yaoguai King you'll fight at the start of The Emerald Hall in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The Keeper of the Flaming Mountains is a master of deception and uses his Yin-Yang ability to produce more than just the Yin-Yang Fish in this showdown.
